mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMPANY(CMCODE, CMNAME, CMADDRESS, CMTEL, CMIMG, CMSTATE, CMLINK, CMMID) VALUES(#{cmcode}, #{cmname}, #{cmaddress}, #{cmtel}, #{cmimg}, 0, #{cmlink}, #{cmmid})
